OAuth2 Test Client Success!

The OAuth2 access_token was granted. Here are some details.

  • access_token: {{token_response.access_token}}
  • token_type: {{token_response.token_type}}
  • expires_at: {{token_response.expires_at}}
  • expires_in: {{token_response.expires_in}}
  • scope: {{token_response.scope}}
  • FHIR patient_id: {{request.user.userprofile.fhir_patient_id}}
  • given_name: {{request.user.first_name}}
  • family_name: {{request.user.last_name }}

Try some API calls

  • User Profile 
    curl -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token_response.access_token}}" "{{settings.HOSTNAME_URL}}{% url 'user_profile' %}"
    • {% for r in settings.FHIR_PATIENT_API_RESOURCES_SUPPORTED %}
  • FHIR {{r}} Resource By ID 
    curl -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token_response.access_token}}" "{{settings.HOSTNAME_URL}}{% url 'patient_facing_fhir_endpoint_with_id_oauth' r request.user.userprofile.fhir_patient_id %}"
  • FHIR {{r}} Search 
    curl -H "Authorization: Bearer {{token_response.access_token}}" "{{settings.HOSTNAME_URL}}{% url 'patient_facing_fhir_endpoint_search_oauth' r  %}?patient={{request.user.userprofile.fhir_patient_id}}"
    • {% endfor %}
  • FHIR Metadata (No token needed) 
    curl "{{settings.HOSTNAME_URL}}{% url 'patient_facing_fhir_metadata_uri' %}"
  • OAuth2 Discovery (No token needed) 
    curl "{{settings.HOSTNAME_URL}}{% url 'oauth_authorization_server' %}"
